desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Flag to indicate whether the transaction was successful.
Flag to indicate whether the transaction was unsuccessful.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Flag to indicate the XML output during a transaction. Usually contains value when the transaction has failed.
Flag to indicate whether the transaction is being accessed/locked for the first time when value is set to 1.
Flag to indicate that the Function has been entered and awaiting for ID.
The key used to identify the different records maintained on this file.
Flag to indicate that a multi-value has been modified (added/deleted) so that validation would happen on the new fields.
